channel.title: Soccer on Michael Pawlus
channel.description: Recent content in Soccer on Michael Pawlus

item.title: World Cup Player Caps and Clubs
item.description: World Cup Player Caps and Clubs This is post three in a series using data for all World Cup teams collected in the first post In the second post we looked explored the ages of players over time, by team and by position as well as checked to see if there was a skewed distribution among birth months. For this post we will look at caps which is the term used for counting how many appearnces a player has made for games at the international level.

item.title: Age of World Cup Players
item.description: Notes Best viewed in landscape on mobile. Unfortunately, the details that are available when hovering over the plotly plots do not seem to be available on mobile at the moment. Not really a 73 minute read. Corrections June 9: Corrected some errors with the x-axis scale in the plotly plots that were present when this was first posted Age of World Cup Players This is post two in a series using data for all World Cup teams collected in the first post
